titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of March 4, 2020, as "National Assistive Technology Awareness Day".
Expressing support for the designation of March 4, 2020, as "National Assistive Technology Awareness Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
This resolution supports the designation of National Assistive Technology Awareness Day.
It also commends assistive technology specialists, program coordinators, organizations, and researchers for their assistance in helping people with disabilities to access such technology.
